description: This is a complete HTML document implementing a web-based database visualizer UI with embedded CSS and JavaScript for fetching and displaying database information and table data.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of available databases and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, resets the UI state, and reloads the databases.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the list of tables for a selected database and loads tables if expanded.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of tables for the selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches data of the selected table and renders it in the main content area.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Builds and inserts the HTML table with data into the DOM.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Generates HTML for individual table cells, handling special formatting for large objects, nulls, and objects.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content to show full data or truncated preview.
